Review Name: Must buy! Review Description: One of best product by LG. Noise level is very low. Faster cooling. Good looking. Energy consumption is negotiable. But flipkart service is very poor. Fast delivery but after delivery flipkart takes no responsibility to initiate installation. With this i also order a stabilizer but flipkart change my ordered model without any pre notification. When i contact to flipkart they all blames are move to the seller, and they shows no responsibility. It is very unpredictable to me.
